dict.acceptation: 预定；适当的；应有的；由于；
应有的权利，应得到的东西；应缴款（如俱乐部会费）；
直接地，直达地；[古语] 适当地；

sent.orig: Dyspnea due to CAD may coexist with that due to another cardiac disease.
sent.trans: 由CAD引起的呼吸困难也可与其他疾病引起的呼吸困难同时存在。

sent.orig: Secondly, the policy should at when due and the due time for continued payment of premiums.
sent.trans: 其次，应看保单何时到期，并在到期前及时续缴保费。

sent.orig: This phenomenon was neither due to the barrier of language, nor due to different personalities.
sent.trans: 这种现象既不是因为语言障碍，也不是因为不同的个性所致。

sent.orig: Amongthese accidents 41.6% are due to professio-nal irresponsiplity,31.7% due to irregularmatching and 26.7% unexperienced perfor-mance(26.7%).
sent.trans: 41.66%属责任事故，31.67%属配血方法不完善，26.67%属经验不足，故建议“五双制”配血输血制度和双重配血法。

sent.orig: Papers are due at the beginning of the lecture on the scheduled due date.
sent.trans: 每份文章均应在到期日的上课开始时缴交。
